title: Ban After Not Being Able To Play
body:
After not being able to even launch the lol client for at least a month, i have come back to find i was suspended 2 days ago for unknown reasons, i do not understand this as 1. I haven't even been able to play for a whole month. and 2. I do not remember doing anything wrong.
Any replies/help would be useful.
Thanks!

replies.body: Did your account get hacked? You might want to send in a support ticket immediately about it if that's the case.
I am unable to tell if it has been as nothing has been done to my account on the forums, password is the same but i cannot login on the launcher.

Well, when you're banned from the game, you aren't banned from posting on the boards. I believe they use separate systems. If when you try to log in it says that you've been banned, then you're probably banned. How long does that ban have remaining?
